title: Evdokia (Alexis Damianos - 1972).NickD76
description:
After realizing the desperately low number of Greek movies in TPB, I am beginning with an effort to encode my greek movie DVDs and share them with the world. This is my third torrent, I would appreciate your comments.

Please help me with seeding!



MOVIE:

Evdokia (1971)
97 min  -  Drama | Romance
Ratings: 7.2/10 from 216 users   

Director: Alexis Damianos
Writers: Alexis Damianos, John Baldwin (dialogue adaptation)
Stars: Maria Vassiliou, Giorgos Koutouzis and Koula Agagiotou

A prostitute (Evdokia) meets a sergeant (Yorgos). They fall in love and get married after a short love affair. Her profession, however, is a barrier for their relationship. They try to stay together and overcome their inner conflicts, but the social environment crushes them.
